Enron:
Wonderful! You and I are now partners. You should be honored! I don't ask just anyone to be my partner, but I like the cut of your jib!
What you need to do is simple. Catch any Alligator, Crokian Lad, Dailaon Lad, Crokian Lad Warrior, Parhit Lad, or Nos Lad you see on Alligator Island, and bring their skin. You'll be compensated based on skin quality.
